segments.text: This scene in the kitchen catches my eye immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman is polishing a plate, completely engrossed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea the faucet is on and flooding the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is everywhere, drenching the floor and doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's wet, and she just keeps drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of clean dishes wait nearby, oblivious too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, turning to the kidsâ€”they're raiding the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on an unstable stool, one wrong move and down he goes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies while balancing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is patiently waiting her turn, arm extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's mischievous, but I feel bad for the potential mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light, showing the neat garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a contrast between outside calm and inside peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman's neutral face makes it all funnier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But really, turn off the water!
segments.speaker: PAR
